title: I cant play LOL on windows 10
body: when i play a game it goes to out of range and the way to fix that is ALT+ENTER but on windows ten that's a HOTKEY so it Neglects the fix and does the hotkey instead.

replies.body:
Did this start happening recently, and if so are you using different monitor than before?  Your settings might be off and failing to load the game properly.  Try a config reset to restore your settings to default, and test it in a custom game to see if it worked.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know the results!
